about_the_game:
The official soundtrack of Scud Frenzy contains all the music from the game and a few bonus tracks.

1 - Scud Frenzy 3:57
2 - Retrofit 5:09
3 - Delta City 3:38
4 - Blueshift 3:12
5 - Chromosphere 3:42
6 - Alpha Vista 3:34
7 - Commodore Nights 4:12
8 - Neon Road 2:24
9 - Arcatype 2:31
10 - Monochrome 4:18
11 - Amiga 4:19
12 - The Grid 5:30

12 banging tracks for your listening pleasure. Music fresh from the mind of Injekted

Soundtrack supplied in MP3 format.
Files will be downloaded into the Scud Frenzy directory on your computer. Right click on Scud Frenzy in your Steam library and browse local files to retrieve the tracks.
